skills.name: Behind the Kindness
desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to **50%** of Natasha's ATK to a single enemy.
Deals Physical DMG equal to **60%** of Natasha's ATK to a single enemy.
Deals Physical DMG equal to **70%** of Natasha's ATK to a single enemy.
Deals Physical DMG equal to **80%** of Natasha's ATK to a single enemy.
Deals Physical DMG equal to **90%** of Natasha's ATK to a single enemy.
Deals Physical DMG equal to **100%** of Natasha's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Love, Heal, and Choose
desc: Restores a single ally for **7.0%** of Natasha's Max HP plus **70**. Restores the ally for another **4.8%** of Natasha's Max HP plus **48** at the beginning of each turn for 2 turn(s).
Restores a single ally for **7.4%** of Natasha's Max HP plus **112**. Restores the ally for another **5.1%** of Natasha's Max HP plus **77** at the beginning of each turn for 2 turn(s).
Restores a single ally for **7.9%** of Natasha's Max HP plus **144**. Restores the ally for another **5.4%** of Natasha's Max HP plus **98** at the beginning of each turn for 2 turn(s).
Restores a single ally for **8.3%** of Natasha's Max HP plus **175**. Restores the ally for another **5.7%** of Natasha's Max HP plus **120** at the beginning of each turn for 2 turn(s).
Restores a single ally for **8.8%** of Natasha's Max HP plus **196**. Restores the ally for another **6.0%** of Natasha's Max HP plus **134** at the beginning of each turn for 2 turn(s).
Restores a single ally for **9.1%** of Natasha's Max HP plus **217**. Restores the ally for another **6.2%** of Natasha's Max HP plus **149** at the beginning of each turn for 2 turn(s).
Restores a single ally for **9.4%** of Natasha's Max HP plus **233**. Restores the ally for another **6.5%** of Natasha's Max HP plus **160** at the beginning of each turn for 2 turn(s).
Restores a single ally for **9.8%** of Natasha's Max HP plus **249**. Restores the ally for another **6.7%** of Natasha's Max HP plus **170** at the beginning of each turn for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Gift of Rebirth
desc: Heals all allies for **9.2%** of Natasha's Max HP plus **92**.
Heals all allies for **9.8%** of Natasha's Max HP plus **147**.
Heals all allies for **10.3%** of Natasha's Max HP plus **189**.
Heals all allies for **10.9%** of Natasha's Max HP plus **230**.
Heals all allies for **11.5%** of Natasha's Max HP plus **258**.
Heals all allies for **12.0%** of Natasha's Max HP plus **285**.
Heals all allies for **12.4%** of Natasha's Max HP plus **306**.
Heals all allies for **12.9%** of Natasha's Max HP plus **327**.

skills.name: Innervation
desc: When healing allies with HP percentage at 30% or lower, increases Natasha's Outgoing Healing by **25%**. This effect also works on continuous healing.
When healing allies with HP percentage at 30% or lower, increases Natasha's Outgoing Healing by **28%**. This effect also works on continuous healing.
When healing allies with HP percentage at 30% or lower, increases Natasha's Outgoing Healing by **30%**. This effect also works on continuous healing.
When healing allies with HP percentage at 30% or lower, increases Natasha's Outgoing Healing by **33%**. This effect also works on continuous healing.
When healing allies with HP percentage at 30% or lower, increases Natasha's Outgoing Healing by **35%**. This effect also works on continuous healing.
When healing allies with HP percentage at 30% or lower, increases Natasha's Outgoing Healing by **38%**. This effect also works on continuous healing.
When healing allies with HP percentage at 30% or lower, increases Natasha's Outgoing Healing by **41%**. This effect also works on continuous healing.
When healing allies with HP percentage at 30% or lower, increases Natasha's Outgoing Healing by **44%**. This effect also works on continuous healing.

skills.name: Hypnosis Research
desc:
Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Physical DMG equal to 80% of Natasha's ATK to a random enemy, with a 100% **base chance** to Weaken all enemies.
While Weakened, enemies deal 30% less DMG to allies for 1 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Pharmacology Expertise
eidolons.desc: After being attacked, if the current HP percentage is 30% or lower, heals self for 1 time to restore HP by an amount equal to 15% of Max HP plus 400. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per battle.

eidolons.name: Clinical Research
eidolons.desc: When Natasha uses her Ultimate, grant continuous healing for 1 turn(s) to allies whose HP is at 30% or lower. And at the beginning of their turn, their HP is restored by an amount equal to 6% of Natasha's Max HP plus 160.

eidolons.name: The Right Cure
eidolons.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Miracle Cure
eidolons.desc: After being attacked, regenerates 5 extra Energy.

eidolons.name: Preventive Treatment
eidolons.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Doctor's Grace
eidolons.desc: Natasha's Basic ATK deals Additional Physical DMG equal to 40% of her Max HP.

skillTree.name: Soothe
skillTree.desc: The Skill removes 1 debuff(s) from a target ally.

skillTree.name: Recuperation
skillTree.desc: Increases the duration of Skill's continuous healing effect for 1 turn(s).
